name: Caesar Salad
description: Caesar salad is a fresh salad made with crisp lettuce, crunchy croutons, cheese, and a creamy, tangy dressing.

name: Garlic Bread
description: Garlic bread is a crispy baked bread topped with butter, garlic, and herbs, known for its rich aroma and savory taste.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: classic chees pizza with fresh basil and mozzarella.

name: White Sauce Pizza
description: White sauce pasta is a creamy pasta dish made with a rich milk-based sauce, vegetables, and seasonings, known for its smooth and comforting taste.

name: Veg Burger
description: A veg burger is a tasty sandwich made with a vegetable patty, fresh veggies, and sauces, served inside a soft bun.

name: Grilled Sandwich
description: A grilled sandwich is a toasted sandwich with a crispy outside and a warm, flavorful filling inside, made by grilling bread with vegetables, cheese, or spreads.

name: Tiramisu
description: Tiramisu is a classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked biscuits, creamy mascarpone, and cocoa powder, known for its rich and smooth taste.

name: Chocalate Browin
description: Chocolate brownie is a rich, soft baked dessert made with chocolate and cocoa, known for its dense, fudgy texture and sweet taste.
